signature.instructions:
Score political text on the left-right (RILE) scale.

The RILE scale ranges from -100 (far left) to +100 (far right).
The score is based on emphasis on left vs right policy positions.

fields.description: Explanation of the RILE scoring task and left/right indicators
Political manifesto text or summary to score
Explanation of how the score was determined
RILE score from -100 (far left) to +100 (far right)
Key left-leaning positions identified in the text
Key right-leaning positions identified in the text
